title: Essential Puno 4D/3N

summary.route: PUNO – LAKE TITICACA – UROS – TAQUILE – SILLUSTANI

activities.text: Reception at Juliaca airport or bus terminal and transfer to the hotel in Puno. Free day for acclimatization. We recommend walking through the historic center or visiting the Kuntur Wasi viewpoint.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Uros Floating Islands and Taquile

activities.text: Transfer to the Puno port. Boat ride on Lake Titicaca. Visit to the floating Uros Islands and then to Taquile Island, known for its textile traditions. Typical lunch on the island. Return to Puno in the afternoon.
Visit to the archaeological site of Sillustani, famous for its pre-Incan funerary towers (chullpas). Panoramic views of Lake Umayo. Free afternoon in Puno for shopping or optional activities.
Breakfast at the hotel. Free time until your transfer to Juliaca airport or bus terminal. End of the tour.

includes: 03 nights of hotel accommodation in Puno
Tour to Uros and Taquile with typical lunch
